title: Memoir '44
description: A historical WWII board game where players reenact battles using miniatures and terrain maps.

title: Undaunted: Normandy
description: A deck-building game set in WWII Normandy where players command squads of soldiers.

title: Villainous
description: Players take on the roles of Disney villains, each with unique objectives and abilities.

title: Everdell
description: Build a woodland city of critters and constructions through worker placement and tableau building.

title: Flamecraft
description: Players are Flamekeepers who assign artisan dragons to shops to earn reputation and craft goods.

title: Lords of Waterdeep
description: Secret rulers of Waterdeep recruit adventurers to complete quests and expand their influence.

title: Battleship
description: A two-player guessing game where players try to sink each other’s fleet of ships.

title: Clue
description: Solve the murder by deducing the killer, weapon, and room through elimination.

title: Haunted Mansion: Call of the Spirits
description: Players explore Disney’s Haunted Mansion, collecting ghost cards while avoiding the Hitchhiking Ghosts.

title: Skip-Bo
description: A sequencing card game where players aim to play all cards from their stockpile.

title: Skull King
description: A trick-taking game with pirates, mermaids, and predictions that earn or lose points.

title: Forbidden Island
description: Players work together to recover treasures from a sinking island before it’s lost to the sea.

title: Ghost Fightin' Treasure Hunters
description: Players team up to recover gems from a haunted house while fending off ghosts.
